summary: This resume outlines the academic background, technical skills, and professional experience of Deep M. Mehta, a full-stack software developer with a strong focus on cloud computing and DevOps. With a Master's in Computer Science and a Bachelor's in Computer Engineering, Mehta has expertise in various programming languages, web/mobile development frameworks, and cloud platforms. Their work experience includes internships and full-time roles at major tech companies, showcasing skills in full-stack development, cloud infrastructure, and DevOps practices. Projects highlight innovative solutions in generative AI, cloud security, DevOps automation, and mobile app development, demonstrating a broad range of technical abilities and a commitment to staying at the forefront of the industry.

Which of the following best describes the 'Azure Cloud Solution' project?
options: A mobile app for secure password management
An AI-powered GitHub bot for CI/CD automation

A DevOps pipeline for Azure and GitHub integration
mcqs.correctAnswer: A secure password management system using Azure's security features
